Ray Pomponio is a data scientist. He received his Master's degree in Biostatistics from the **University of Colorado** in 2023.

Ray has contributed to team science collaborations and provided biostatistical expertise/support for grant writing, study design, and longitudinal analysis. He has co-authored 20+ manuscripts in peer-reviewed journals.

Please reach out using any of the links below, or via email: raymond.pomponio (at) outlook.com.
